content.html:
Rooting consists in linking facts extracted through the formatting worksystem to other information sources under the form of URLs.

As a rooter, you will need to go look for information on the web that is directly linked to the fact you are investigating.

As for all other operations on Exorde, a small stake in EXD will be deducted from your virtual wallet to avoid spamming and enforce quality.

Numeric values stated in the fact as well as positives/negatives must be respected!

The more links you provide to a fact, the higher your reward will be upon validation!
